A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was able to go in without expectations. I'm not a fanatic but I did buy Friday night tix 2 months ago. Visually amazing. Fight choreography solid. Adam Driver has an amazing performance that requires him to emote vulnerability\, longing and rage (sometimes simultaneously). I would have cut out a couple of scenes. Pleasantly surprised twice. No screw ups. Solid movie given it is a \"2 of 3\" -- no super satisfying finale.
